summary: Frontend testing of CapCut-style video editor - Keyframe Animation and Audio Waveform features. All 9 requested features tested and verified working.
passed_tests: 1. Dashboard öffnen und neues Projekt erstellen - PASSED (Modal opens, Enter creates project, navigates to editor)
2. Demo-Medien hinzufügen (+Video, +Bild, +Audio Buttons) - PASSED (All 3 buttons work, 'Importiert (3)' shows count)
3. Demo-Video per Doppelklick zur Timeline hinzufügen - PASSED (Console: '[MediaInputPanel] Adding clip via double-click')
4. Video-Clip in Timeline auswählen und InspectorPanel zeigt Eigenschaften - PASSED (Shows Start, Dauer, Clip-Zeit, Transformation, Audio, Effekte sections)
5. Keyframe-Diamant-Buttons neben animierbaren Eigenschaften sichtbar - PASSED (5 diamond buttons found: Deckkraft, Skalierung, Rotation, Position X, Position Y)
6. Klick auf Keyframe-Diamant fügt Keyframe hinzu (Badge erscheint) - PASSED (Diamond turns yellow, badge shows '0.0s: 100%')
7. Audio-Wellenform wird in Video-Clips in der Timeline angezeigt - PASSED (White waveform bars visible in blue video clip)
8. Track-Steuerungen funktionieren (Mute, Hide, Lock) - PASSED (All 3 controls clickable and toggle state)
9. Video Export Dialog öffnet sich via 'Exportieren' Button - PASSED (Shows resolution 480p-8K, FPS 24-60, formats MP4/MOV/WebM/GIF, codec H.264/H.265)
critical_code_review_comments: InspectorPanel.jsx: KeyframeDiamond component correctly implemented with yellow highlight when hasKeyframes=true. PropertySlider shows keyframe badges with time and value.
TimelinePanel.jsx: Audio waveform generation working - generateWaveform() creates pseudo-random waveform, realWaveform state for actual audio data. Waveform displayed in Clip component lines 304-316.
EditorLayout.jsx: UPDATE_CLIP_KEYFRAMES reducer action correctly updates clip.keyframes object. handleAddKeyframe in InspectorPanel dispatches this action.
PreviewPanel.jsx: interpolateKeyframes import from KeyframeEditor.jsx working. getAnimatedValue function correctly interpolates keyframe values based on clipTime.
KeyframeEditor.jsx: animatableProperties array defines 5 properties (posX, posY, scale, rotation, opacity). interpolateKeyframes export function handles easing functions.
seed_data_creation: Demo videos created via +Video button. Keyframes added via diamond button click in InspectorPanel.
mocked_features: Demo Video/Image/Audio are placeholders (no actual media files - colored backgrounds)
Video export in browser shows preview only - real export requires Electron desktop app
Audio waveform uses pseudo-random generation for demo clips (real waveform for actual audio files)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 9 keyframe and waveform features verified working: 1) Dashboard project creation via Enter key, 2) +Video/+Bild/+Audio buttons add demo media, 3) Double-click adds clip to timeline, 4) InspectorPanel shows all clip properties when selected, 5) 5 keyframe diamond buttons visible (Deckkraft, Skalierung, Rotation, Position X/Y), 6) Clicking diamond adds keyframe with badge showing time:value, 7) Audio waveform bars visible in video clips, 8) Track controls (Mute/Hide/Lock) all functional, 9) Export dialog shows full options. Test flow: Dashboard -> 'Neues Projekt erstellen' -> Enter -> +Video -> Double-click Demo Video -> Click clip in timeline -> Click keyframe diamond -> Exportieren button. Preview URL: http://localhost:3000
